name: Outward
description: Select the GoG offline installer setup_outward_1.0.0_(64bit)_(33087).exe when asked for setup file. The GoG installer will throw some errors when finished, but the game will work.
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
- mf_install:
    filename: master.zip
    url: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install/archive/master.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Outward/Outward.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/mfinstall
    src: mf_install
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    env:
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/mfinstall/mf-install.sh
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: faudio
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    description: Installing Outward
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: false
wine:
  Desktop: false
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
